The article was published on a fake news: The expert's verdict mentions that the source of the article, National Report, is a fake news website. This aspect verifies that the claim is not authentic.
The article came from a satirical public: The expert's verdict states that National Report is a news and political satire web publication. This aspect further confirms that the claim is not genuine.
The disclaimer of the website clarifies: The expert's verdict includes the disclaimer from National Report, which clearly states that all news articles on the website are fiction. This aspect reinforces that the claim is not based on truth.
The official Fast: Furious film released without Justin Bieber: The expert's verdict mentions that the eighth entry in the Fast & Furious franchise, titled The Fate of the Furious, was released in 2017 and starred Vin Diesel instead of Justin Bieber. This aspect provides evidence that the claim of Bieber replacing Paul Walker is false.
